main event: Two civilians observed a large round yellow-orange light in the sky while stargazing in Allentown, Pennsylvania.
interesting points: The light appeared to come closer and then suddenly vanished., It was initially thought to be a satellite, but it was much larger and moved differently., The observation lasted for about 5 minutes., There were no sounds heard coming from the object., The sighting was documented as part of Project Blue Book investigation.
sighted object: a round yellow-orange light in the sky
